name: ToDollachi
description:
ToDollachi

A game (prototype) made for "The Sweet to Sour Game Jam"

A young girl is left home alone for a whole week. What can she possibly do to occupy her time?

But don't worry too much about her being bored lonely, for she soon makes a new friend with a fondness for dolls, and spends her days searching for accessories to make them even more beautiful!

Nights can't flow quickly enough for the next day to come!

How to play:

You can use the arrows keys to move, and enter to interact.

By pressing escape, you can pause the game and save.

If you encounter a game over or any other end state, please refresh the webpage.
